topicTitle: A map F1 tab for players new to PERP

posts.postText:
I've come across a few players who don't know where they are or where to go. The FAQ tab is pretty good, but just saying "car dealership" isn't going to help if they don't know where it is.

Although it does promote friendliness to physically guide people around, the map could help new players become more independent. Thanks
+1 but not because new players need this. I need this pretty bad.
